title: Cant choose ward skin
body: So i have been opening augment boxes that i purchased a while ago and i unlocked some ward skins that i used essance to unlock and ever since then i have not been able to use the ward skin option

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct, this is an issue we're aware of and are looking into finding a permanent solution for. It's purely a visual bug, though, so the ward skin is still on your account, you just can't select it at the moment.

I don't have a timeline I can provide as to when this issue will be resolved, but please let me know if you have any other questions.

I was wondering, rather than typing out a reply to everyone who's missing their ward skins and come here to complain, wouldn't it be more helpful to create a thread about it, lock it and stick it on top of Help and Support for the time being, even if it just decreases the amount of threads by 20% then that is still a significant amount.

If you're worried about a red sticker, I took the liberty of creating a thread, or you could ask some of your NA wrenchies to post it.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pOslJHiQ-knownward-skins-missing
It just a bug right now. http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
